short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will fill in links to LinkedIn and GitHub profiles on job apps for Lever.co's Application Tracking System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to make it easy to fill out job applications using Lever.co's application tracking system. Stores information inside Chrome local storage and uses JQuery to validate Lever's ATS and pre-fill information in the text fields.
